div.p: MY CHILDHOOD WAS THAN THEIRS. FINALLY TONIGHT, THE TIP OF THE
DAY. IT’S CHRISTMAS TIME.
WE SHOULD BE GENEROUS IF WE CAN TO THOSE WHO HELP US.
HERE IS MY TIP ADVICE. YOU HAVE TO RECOGNIZE YOUR
MAILMAN, BUT GET THIS. POSTAL WORKERS CAN ACCEPT ONLY
UP TO $20 BY LAW. YOU CAN GIVE THEM COOKIES AND
STUFF, POPCORN. HERE IS AN IMPORTANT ONE.
YOUR GARBAGE COLLECTORS.
BE GENEROUS TO THEM. UNLESS THEY ARE SCREW-UPS.
THEY CAN REALLY HELP YOU OUT. YOU LIVE IN AN APARTMENT
BUILDING AND YOU HAVE A DOORMAN, TAKE CARE OF HIM OR HER.
OTHER PEOPLE GETTING TIPS IF SOMEBODY HELPS TO CLEAN YOUR
HOUSE. YOUR AUTO MECHANIC AND DONATE
MONEY TO YOUR CHURCH. IF YOU DON’T GO TO CHURCH, PICK
OUT A CHARITY YOU RESPECT. WE HAVE A LIST OF THEM ON
BILLOREILLY.COM WE GIVE MONEY TO.
THE MONEY GOES TO THE RIGHT PLACE.
CHARITY IS IMPORTANT AT CHRISTMAS TIME.
FOR THOSE WHO DON’T HAVE MUCH MONEY, BAKE COOKIES, MAKE STUFF.
EVERYBODY LIKES IT. I FEEL A LOT BETTER FOR MAKING
MY LIST THIS MORNING. THAT’S IT FOR US.
CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE.
DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM. SPOUT OFF FROM ANYWHERE IN THE
